body:
Isis Web is an Enyo(1) browser app for webOS. It's based on the stock web browser of webOS but it boasts more features than the stock web browser.

It uses the Enyo WebView control to display web content which in turn
uses BrowserAdapter and BrowserServer to talk to webOS WebKit.

name: Isis Web
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: An awesome Enyo-based web browser for webOS.
